name: Alch & Blueprints 2 Go
author: mbXtreme
description: A simple and efficient Alch and Go strategy combined with Heist for steady profit. Just run maps, open Smuggler's Caches, and collect fully revealed blueprints to sell in bulk.  Perfect for any build, this strategy guarantees consistent income with minimal effort.

name: Free expedition loot no DPS required
author: LugswoPoE
description: Leverage the Missing Life Idol with Expedition monsters. This strategy requires no DPS. Expedition enemies spawn with drastically reduced health and die instantly, giving logbooks, reroll currencies, and burial medallions.

name: Low-Budget Harvest Strat
author: Sindekus
description: A low-risk, high-reward Harvest farming strategy with guaranteed Tier 3 crop spawns and affordable Idols. With 300% increased Tier 3 crop chance and 100% additional Harvest chance, each map consistently yields strong returns. Minimal investment is required, and removing the Doubling Scarab can make it even easier but not recommended.
scarabs: Harvest Scarab, Harvest Scarab of Doubling

name: Searing Exarch currency farming strategy
author: aldodzb
description: A farming strategy centered on maximizing currency gains through Searing Exarch altars by stacking small pack-size Idols. Running Mausoleum and Jungle Valley ensures boss mods wont appear, allowing consistent minion altar choices. Results vary, but consistent map spamming leads to strong returns over time.

name: Delirium Farm
author: NickZiri
description: The setup includes budget-friendly Idols that boost reward progress and increase Delirium orb drops. Profits come mainly from Delirium orbs, Scarabs, cluster jewels, and other valuable drops (Blue or Red altars)

name: Destructive Play Farming
author: Allie
description: A midgame build is probably required. Farm scoured Shaper Guardian maps for Maven invitations. Aim for at least 25% total chance to drop Shaper Guardian maps from Idols. Refer to the video for details on rolling invitations.
